pageProduct.name: OGX Renewing Moroccan Argan Oil Penetrating Oil 100ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

OGX Argan Oil of Morocco Penetrating Oil is a suitable hair oil for all hair types. This argan hair oil treatment helps to penetrate, moisturize, revive and create softness and strength.

Why You Want OGX Renewing+ Argan Oil of Morocco Penetrating Oil.
This exotic, precious hair oil with argan oil of Morocco helps to penetrate, moisturize, revive and create softness and strength while protecting your hair from harmful styling heat and UV damage. Discover smooth, sexy tresses.

A unique, precious blend with argan oil of Morocco instantly helps to penetrate the hair shaft restoring shine and softness while strengthening. Discover soft, seductive, silky perfection.



  • Lightweight but hydrating formula

  • Apply to the hair and leave in

  • Coats the hair to help restore shine and moisturise dry ends

Size: 100mL

Shelf Life in Days: 1095 days

KEY FEATURES

• Argan Oil of Morocco
• Penetrating Oil
• Suitable for All Hair Types


Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs rinse immediately.

Ingredients

Cyclopentasiloxane, Cyclotetrasiloxane, Dimethiconol, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Fragrance (Parfum), Yellow 11 (CI 47000).

Directions

Apply a small amount to palm, rub hands together, then apply evenly to surface of damp (towel dried) hair working through to ends. For best results use in conjunction with other OGX products.
